TopicTitle: Will someone play ksp multiplayer mod with me?

Articles.Content: There are no KSP multiplayer mods. Also, multiplayer doesn't appear to be possible in KSP.

MULTIPLAYER IDEA:

Everyone goes on their own timewarp, until they get within physics loading distance, then it locks to 1x.

You'll most likely only be near someone for docking or synchronized landing, and at that point 1x time is tolerable.

There are no KSP multiplayer mods. Also, multiplayer doesn't appear to be possible in KSP.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24926-0-20-Kerbal-LiveFeed-Passive-Multiplayer-Plugin-Client-Server-v0-6-6

I think OP means this.
